titleStmt.title: Fifty queries, seriously propounded to those that question, or deny infants right to baptism By J.B. an hearty well-wisher to their souls, and to the Churches peace.
titleStmt.author: Barret, John, 1631-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nevil Symonds at the Princes Arms, and Jonathan Robinson at the Golden Lyon in St. Paul's Church Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Golden Lyon in St. Paul's Church Yard
